quote: It sounds romantic to die for love but it's much more romantic to live
source: Mary Malone, His Dark Materials S3E8

quote: You can't bury what comes from the dirt
When you're near the top of the mountain, sometimes you have to write the ten commandments yourself
I was born stupid, but I will not die hungry
When the tide goes out, we find out who's not wearing bathing suits
Showing emotion is part of being a modern sexy man
They think I'm in the shadows - but I am the shadows
What is a man? A miserable little pile of secrets!
source: Dracula, Castlevania Symphony of the Night
